value:
So much time has passed since I
first came to Askr. I have such
fond memories of my time here.

My brother and the people of Nifl
are working so hard to restore our
homeland and bring happiness to all.

I am glad to spend time with you
again. Oh, I didn't really mean
anything by that. I'm just happy.

Please, allow me to continue
to repay my debt to you. That
is my wish.

This weapon is the power of Nifl,
the god of ice, crystallized. To
wield it is an immense honor.

I am Fjorm of Nifl, the Kingdom of
Ice. I hope you will continue to
treat $Nf well.
For $Nu!
Slowly but surely, step by step.
Not again... I'm sorry.

Thank you. I will strive even
harder now.

I am Fjorm, clad in the armor of the
champion of Nifl, god of ice. I am
pleased to rejoin your side.

I have come to understand that Lady
Nifl was close to Queen Hvergel, my
ancestor.$k$pI have also come to understand
something about losing someone
you care about...$k$pI have a request for you,
$Nu.$k$pPlease, allow me to protect you from
any enemy that may seek to harm
you—from across all the nine realms.$k$pEven if I must sacrifice myself to do
it, I will ensure your safety.
せやっ！
Ice...
きゃああっ！
I can't lose...
Nifl, God of Ice!
Even if I die...
All I have, I give!
Freeze!
Princess Laegjarn...
Sigh
This weapon and armor were granted to me by the great Nifl, god of ice.
Ah! Please, do not startle me like that! *pause* I'm glad to see you're the same as ever.
A power bestowed by a god... Am I truly worthy to bear such a thing?
I wonder how Princess Laegjarn felt at that moment... I can't even imagine it.
I will give my life to repay your kindness.
I know it may not seem it, but Lady Nifl is actually very kind.
Being here with you again... I couldn't ask for anything more.
Yes?
Lady Nifl...
I'll protect you.
